A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just feel like Disney have missed a trick here. Characters that you don't really care about or were handled well\, and characters that could have led a massive story arc get killed. I have to say that I thought Hamill was excellent. Not sure where Episode IX goes from here\, but feels like the original trilogy is being killed off when it could neatly lead the future of Star Wars in to the future. Don't ruin it for a generation that gave Star Wars its life!!
